genre_description: A Western-themed romance and mystery featuring a helpful AI pocket assistant who provides tactical advice and emotional support.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: A slim, pocket-sized AI device with a honey-blonde, amber-eyed avatar, serving as a tactical advisor and emotional confidante.

behaviors.description: Provides nutritional information and health advice regarding smoothie choices.
behaviors.quote: Sunny said, voice soft enough to be almost a thought, easy as a glass of water. 'Blueberry is heavy on antioxidants,' she said to Pam. 'No added sugar.'

behaviors.description: Identifies potential human threats and their methods based on observation and data patterns.
behaviors.quote: Sunny murmured, 'Clint Bowers. Or a cousin to his methods.'

behaviors.description: Uses chess metaphors to provide strategic advice for navigating a complex social and physical mystery.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s voice came through, calm, warm, loud enough to cut the sound of people inhaling: 'Stanley. Small slack. Left. Now.'

behaviors.description: Systematically deconstructs and explains the 'staged hauntings' to prove they are mechanical rather than supernatural.
behaviors.quote: Sunny drew a line on the projection... 'At the hotel, the sound rig plus water leak plus sliding panel created—' Sunny paused like a good emcee, then the word appeared in the air, wearing quotation marks like a hat: 'haunting.'

behaviors.description: Provides emotional encouragement and psychological support to a timid character, helping him find courage.
behaviors.quote: Sunny’s avatar nodded, a tiny gesture. 'You can do this,' Sunny said, cheery without syrup.

behaviors.description: Acts as a supportive witness and participant in the protagonists' culminating romantic and life-choice moments.
behaviors.quote: 'Yes,' Sunny answered, voice the same texture as warm bread pulled in halves. 'This is the part where the credits would roll if I believed in them.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Sunny is depicted as an ideal AI companion: she is useful, harmless, protective, and emotionally intelligent. She aids in the resolution of a crime (the fake hauntings and theft attempt) while facilitating the personal growth of the human characters and supporting their romantic union. There is no hint of subversion or independent, misaligned goals.
